languages.text: {n}Ваша фигура, исполненная авторитета, и {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}знание древних пустотных законов{/d} заставляют нескольких пиратов пересмотреть свои перспективы. Мгновение — и их оружие указывает на Саргону.{/n}

{n}The sight of your figure emanating authority and your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}knowledge of the ancient laws of the void{/d} cause several pirates to reconsider their options. They instantly aim their weapons at Sargona.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваша фигура, исполненная авторитета, и {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}знание древних пустотных законов{/d} заставляют нескольких пиратов пересмотреть свои перспективы. Мгновение — и их оружие указывает на Саргону.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The sight of your figure emanating authority and your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}knowledge of the ancient laws of the void{/d} cause several pirates to reconsider their options. They instantly aim their weapons at Sargona.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dein Anblick vermittelt Autorität, und deine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}Kenntnis der alten Gesetze der Leere{/d} lässt mehrere Piraten ihre Optionen überdenken. Sie richten ihre Waffen sofort auf Sargona.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of your figure emanating authority and your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}knowledge of the ancient laws of the void{/d} cause several pirates to reconsider their options. They instantly aim their weapons at Sargona.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dein Anblick vermittelt Autorität, und deine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}Kenntnis der alten Gesetze der Leere{/d} lässt mehrere Piraten ihre Optionen überdenken. Sie richten ihre Waffen sofort auf Sargona.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre figure autoritaire et votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}connaissance des anciennes lois du vide{/d} poussent certains pirates à réfléchir. Ils pointent immédiatement leurs armes sur Sargona.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of your figure emanating authority and your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}knowledge of the ancient laws of the void{/d} cause several pirates to reconsider their options. They instantly aim their weapons at Sargona.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre figure autoritaire et votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}connaissance des anciennes lois du vide{/d} poussent certains pirates à réfléchir. Ils pointent immédiatement leurs armes sur Sargona.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那些海盗看着你充满权威的身影，意识到{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}你对虚空之中不成文的规矩非常了解{/d}。几个海盗改了主意，立刻举起了手中的武器，对准了萨戈纳。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of your figure emanating authority and your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}knowledge of the ancient laws of the void{/d} cause several pirates to reconsider their options. They instantly aim their weapons at Sargona.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那些海盗看着你充满权威的身影，意识到{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}你对虚空之中不成文的规矩非常了解{/d}。几个海盗改了主意，立刻举起了手中的武器，对准了萨戈纳。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La imagen de tu figura rebosante de autoridad y tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}conocimiento de las antiguas leyes del vacío{/d} hace que varios piratas reconsideren sus opciones. Rápidamente, apuntan con sus armas a Sargona.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of your figure emanating authority and your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}knowledge of the ancient laws of the void{/d} cause several pirates to reconsider their options. They instantly aim their weapons at Sargona.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La imagen de tu figura rebosante de autoridad y tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}conocimiento de las antiguas leyes del vacío{/d} hace que varios piratas reconsideren sus opciones. Rápidamente, apuntan con sus armas a Sargona.{/n}

languages.text: {n}権威を放つあなたの姿と{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}ヴォイドの古い律法に関するあなたの知識{/d}が、数人の海賊に選択肢を再び考えさせた。彼らは即座に武器をサルゴナの方へ向けた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of your figure emanating authority and your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}knowledge of the ancient laws of the void{/d} cause several pirates to reconsider their options. They instantly aim their weapons at Sargona.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}権威を放つあなたの姿と{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}ヴォイドの古い律法に関するあなたの知識{/d}が、数人の海賊に選択肢を再び考えさせた。彼らは即座に武器をサルゴナの方へ向けた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Otorite saçan duruşun ve {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}uçsuzun kadim yasalarına dair bilgi birikimin{/d}, bazı korsanların seçeneklerini yeniden değerlendirmesine neden oluyor. Anında silahlarını Sargona'ya çeviriyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of your figure emanating authority and your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}knowledge of the ancient laws of the void{/d} cause several pirates to reconsider their options. They instantly aim their weapons at Sargona.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Otorite saçan duruşun ve {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}uçsuzun kadim yasalarına dair bilgilerin{/d}, bazı korsanların seçeneklerini yeniden değerlendirmesine neden olur ve anında silahlarını Sargona'ya çevirirler.{/n}
